response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value for me. I understand that the true worth of this item may be subjective and varies from person to person. With that in mind, I am offering you the chance to own this product at a special introductory price of $950,000. This represents a significant discount compared to its intrinsic value, aiming to make it more accessible to you while still ensuring a fair return for my investment. I believe that this offer presents an excellent opportunity for both of us to benefit. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you're interested in proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 950000}
